mapper.insert: insert into b_applicant( gmt_create, gmt_modify, surname, firstname, birthday, type, visa_code, visa_expiration_date, nut_cloud, file_url, first_controller_contents, user_id) values ( now(), now(), #{surname}, #{firstname}, #{birthday}, #{type}, #{visaCode}, #{visaExpirationDate}, #{nutCloud}, #{fileUrl}, #{firstControllerContents}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, surname, firstname, birthday, type, visa_code AS visaCode, visa_expiration_date AS visaExpirationDate, nut_cloud AS nutCloud, file_url AS fileUrl, first_controller_contents AS firstControllerContents, user_id AS userId FROM b_applicant WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY id LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, surname, firstname, birthday, type, visa_code AS visaCode, visa_expiration_date AS visaExpirationDate, nut_cloud AS nutCloud, file_url AS fileUrl, first_controller_contents AS firstControllerContents, user_id AS userId FROM b_applicant WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_applicant WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
